title: Kahala Mall
seo_description: Located just a short drive from Waikiki, this fun neighborhood mall offers a wide variety of boutiques, specialty food shops, restaurants, a movie theatre, and flagship stores such as Whole Foods, Apple Store and Ross.
contents_1: Located just a short drive from Waikiki, this fun neighborhood mall offers a wide variety of boutiques, specialty food shops
